SourceString: A measure of your speed and finesse.\r\n• Supports Light Armor, Medium Armor and fast weapons\r\n• Counts towards Fitness and Cunning, which increase certain damage types.
• Basis for Poison Damage and Lightning Damage
• Basis for Strike Damage and Pierce Damage
A measure of your expertise and insight.\r\n• Supports Magos Robes, Plated Robes and magical weapons\r\n• Counts towards Cunning and Resolve, which increase certain damage types.
A measure of your power and aggression.\r\n• Supports Heavy Armor, Ornate Armor and heavy weapons\r\n• Counts towards Fitness and Resolve, which increase certain damage types.
• Basis for Fire Damage and Cold Damage
A measure of your health and tenacity.\r\n• Counts towards all Secondary Attributes\r\n• Increases base Health Points
Your basic physical and mental talents that determine your general capabilities and enable you to use different gear.
DevComment: This description explains the concept of attributes - what they are used for and what they affect.
Utilized in floating combat text - damage numbers, experience, etc.

SourceString: Main Attributes can be developed to make you more capable in a given area.
Each represents a combination of two Main Attributes, and mainly improves related Damage.
